Name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim: Dragonborn
Overview:
Dragonborn is DLC (downloadable content) for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim. It takes place on Solstheim, an island of the coast of Morrowind with the player continuing to play as the Dragonborn. Shortly after arriving on Solstheim, the Dragonborn is attacked by a group known as the followers of Miraak. After defeating them, a note can be discovered on one of the dead followers revealing that they work for a man called Miraak. The story follows the players investigation into this note to discover the motivations behind the attack.

In addition to the new story arc, Dragonborn also brings new locations and dungeons that come with the new land, as well as new shouts, weapons, armor, creatures, the ability to ride dragons and Xbox 360 achievements.
Genres: Action; Puzzle; Racing; Role-Playing; Sandbox; Shooter
